content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259192,"originalJapaneseLine":"私も・・あいつの子を産んでいたら、エールみたいな子が居たのかも","translatedEnglishLine":"If I had also borne his child, maybe there would have been a child like Yell."},{"lineNumber":259193,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやいや、ないない、そんな事考えるなんて私らしくない","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, no way, thinking like that isn't like me."},{"lineNumber":259194,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、いい、あの子らは　とんでもない才能を受け継いでいるがまだまだ甘い","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, whatever. Those kids have inherited incredible talent but are still naive."},{"lineNumber":259195,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が指導してやるさ。あの子らなら私が届かなかった高みまでいけるかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll give them guidance. They might be able to reach heights I couldn't."},{"lineNumber":259196,"originalJapaneseLine":"酒場","translatedEnglishLine":"Tavern"},{"lineNumber":259197,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんなで集まって食事という所だがメンバーが少ない","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a place where everyone gathers to eat, but there are few members."},{"lineNumber":259198,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し暗い雰囲気","translatedEnglishLine":"A slightly gloomy atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":259199,"originalJapaneseLine":"楽勝だと意気込んで戦いに向かったザンスがアレキサンダーに敗れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu, who enthusiastically went into battle expecting an easy win, was defeated by Alexander."},{"lineNumber":259200,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義も魔女クリチェルに負けた、さらに呪いを掛けられて目が見えなくなっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi also lost to the witch Krichel and was further cursed, losing his sight."},{"lineNumber":259201,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人とも落ち込んで部屋から出てこない","translatedEnglishLine":"Both are down and won't come out of their rooms."},{"lineNumber":259202,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズ、まったくメンタル弱いな、私は負けたのに平気だそ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms, your mentality is really weak. I lost but I'm fine."},{"lineNumber":259203,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日、エールに負けたのもちょっとミスっただけだ、次やればまだまだ私の方が強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Losing to Yell today was just a small mistake. Next time I'm still much stronger."},{"lineNumber":259204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259205,"originalJapaneseLine":"リクチルについて","translatedEnglishLine":"About Rikuchil"},{"lineNumber":259206,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義は、今も目が見えないまま、治療の方法が分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi still cannot see, and the method to cure him is unknown."},{"lineNumber":259207,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット　昔から居るカラーの裏切り者、パステルなら解除出来るが私には無理","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset, a traitor among the colors who has been around for a long time. Pastel can undo it, but I can't."},{"lineNumber":259208,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール、次、僕が対戦だから必ず倒して、その呪いを解かせてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell, next it's my turn to fight, so I'll definitely defeat and have that curse lifted."},{"lineNumber":259209,"originalJapaneseLine":"準決勝第２試合","translatedEnglishLine":"Semi-final, match 2"},{"lineNumber":259210,"originalJapaneseLine":"コロシアム","translatedEnglishLine":"Colosseum"},{"lineNumber":259211,"originalJapaneseLine":"アナウンスでエールとリクチェルが紹介される","translatedEnglishLine":"Announcement introduces Yell and Rikchel."},{"lineNumber":259212,"originalJapaneseLine":"リクチェル　ターゲットはリセット、だから参加したという","translatedEnglishLine":"Rikchel says her target is Reset, so she joined."},{"lineNumber":259213,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふてぶてしい女","translatedEnglishLine":"A brazen woman."},{"lineNumber":259214,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"→ Battle"},{"lineNumber":259215,"originalJapaneseLine":"控え室","translatedEnglishLine":"Waiting room"},{"lineNumber":259216,"originalJapaneseLine":"リクチェルに乱義の呪いを解かせる","translatedEnglishLine":"Have Rikchel lift Rangi's curse."},{"lineNumber":259217,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットが辻呪い犯として逮捕する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset is arrested as a random curse offender."},{"lineNumber":259218,"originalJapaneseLine":"酒場、朝","translatedEnglishLine":"Tavern, morning."},{"lineNumber":259219,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール、リセット、他数名・・　朝きっちりしている子達","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell, Reset, and a few others... kids who are punctual in the morning."},{"lineNumber":259220,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール君、明日は決勝だよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell-kun, the final is tomorrow, right?"},{"lineNumber":259221,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここまできたから、がんばろう。アレキサンダーさんか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Since we've come this far, let's do our best. Alexander, huh..."},{"lineNumber":259222,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにアレキサンダーが現れて少し会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander appears there and has a brief conversation."},{"lineNumber":259223,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259224,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスと乱義が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu and Rangi appeared."},{"lineNumber":259225,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい聞いたか、カオスの広場がオープンしたぞ、いこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, did you hear? The Chaos Plaza has opened, let's go."},{"lineNumber":259226,"originalJapaneseLine":"忘れたのか、俺達の目的は闘神大会に優勝する事ではない、負けたのはくやしくない","translatedEnglishLine":"Have you forgotten? Our goal isn't to win the Fighting God tournament. Losing doesn't frustrate me."},{"lineNumber":259227,"originalJapaneseLine":"大事なのは、本戦に出場してカオスの広場に入り、木のオーブを取る事だ","translatedEnglishLine":"What's important is to enter the main battle, get into Chaos Plaza, and take the wooden orb."},{"lineNumber":259228,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして魔剣カオスを引き抜く事。","translatedEnglishLine":"And then to pull out the magic sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259229,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが、別に急がなくても決勝が終わってからでもいいんじゃないと言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone said there's no need to rush and we can wait until after the finals."},{"lineNumber":259230,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして誰かに先に抜かれてはいけないだろ、急ごうとひっぱられる","translatedEnglishLine":"But maybe no one should pull it out before us, so they urge to hurry."},{"lineNumber":259231,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスの広場","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos Plaza"},{"lineNumber":259232,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここに入れるのは、本戦に出場した　エール、ザンス、乱義、レリコフ、アームズ","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who can enter here are main battle participants: Yell, Zansu, Rangi, Rerikof, Arms."},{"lineNumber":259233,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでにアームズは先に来ていた。他に何名かの出場者も","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms had already come earlier, along with several other participants."},{"lineNumber":259234,"originalJapaneseLine":"シュリさんが魔剣カオスの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Shuri-san explains about the magic sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259236,"originalJapaneseLine":"台座を調べると木のオーブが見つかった。やったー","translatedEnglishLine":"Investigating the pedestal, we found the wooden orb. Yay!"},{"lineNumber":259237,"originalJapaneseLine":"これで全部揃ったぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"Now we have everything complete."},{"lineNumber":259238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259239,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス、乱義、アームズ、レリコフがチャレンジ","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu, Rangi, Arms, and Rerikof try the challenge."},{"lineNumber":259240,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の者もチャレンジするが駄目・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Others also try, but no good..."},{"lineNumber":259241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カオスの負の力で持つとみんな力が抜ける感じになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to Chaos's negative power, anyone who holds it feels all their strength drained."},{"lineNumber":259242,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス・・俺はランスを倒せる可愛い女の子にしか抜けないぞ。次のオーナーは美女だ。美女。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says... I can only be pulled out by a cute girl who can defeat Rance. The next owner will be a beauty. A beauty."},{"lineNumber":259243,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスはしゃべる剣である所を見せつけ、まわりを煽る","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos shows that it is a talking sword and stirs up those around."},{"lineNumber":259244,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスは別にいいかとスルーしようとするエール","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell tries to ignore Chaos thinking it's fine."},{"lineNumber":259245,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが誰かに勧められてやるだけやってみる事にした","translatedEnglishLine":"But persuaded by someone, he decides to at least try."},{"lineNumber":259246,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスを引き抜こうとする","translatedEnglishLine":"Attempts to pull out the magic sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259247,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールが男なら、男は嫌だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"If Yell were a man, I don't want a man."},{"lineNumber":259248,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールが女なら、まだ若すぎる。もっとぼいなぼいんになってからだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"If Yell is a woman, still too young. Should wait until more... well-endowed."},{"lineNumber":259249,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、抵抗むなしく抜かれてしまう。あーれ、なして・・抵抗出来なーーーいとカオス","translatedEnglishLine":"However, despite resistance, it's pulled out. \"Ah, why... I can't resist!\" says Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259250,"originalJapaneseLine":"宿屋に戻った","translatedEnglishLine":"Returned to the inn."},{"lineNumber":259251,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶーたれるザンス、アームズ","translatedEnglishLine":"Pouting Zansu and Arms."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も・・あいつの子を産んでいたら、エールみたいな子が居たのかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I had also borne his child, maybe there would have been a child like Yell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやいや、ないない、そんな事考えるなんて私らしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, no way, thinking like that isn't like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いい、あの子らは　とんでもない才能を受け継いでいるがまだまだ甘い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, whatever. Those kids have inherited incredible talent but are still naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が指導してやるさ。あの子らなら私が届かなかった高みまでいけるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give them guidance. They might be able to reach heights I couldn't.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tavern

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなで集まって食事という所だがメンバーが少ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a place where everyone gathers to eat, but there are few members.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し暗い雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A slightly gloomy atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽勝だと意気込んで戦いに向かったザンスがアレキサンダーに敗れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, who enthusiastically went into battle expecting an easy win, was defeated by Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義も魔女クリチェルに負けた、さらに呪いを掛けられて目が見えなくなっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi also lost to the witch Krichel and was further cursed, losing his sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも落ち込んで部屋から出てこない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both are down and won't come out of their rooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ、まったくメンタル弱いな、私は負けたのに平気だそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, your mentality is really weak. I lost but I'm fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日、エールに負けたのもちょっとミスっただけだ、次やればまだまだ私の方が強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing to Yell today was just a small mistake. Next time I'm still much stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチルについて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Rikuchil

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義は、今も目が見えないまま、治療の方法が分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi still cannot see, and the method to cure him is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット　昔から居るカラーの裏切り者、パステルなら解除出来るが私には無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, a traitor among the colors who has been around for a long time. Pastel can undo it, but I can't.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール、次、僕が対戦だから必ず倒して、その呪いを解かせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, next it's my turn to fight, so I'll definitely defeat and have that curse lifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準決勝第２試合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Semi-final, match 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Colosseum

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アナウンスでエールとリクチェルが紹介される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Announcement introduces Yell and Rikchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェル　ターゲットはリセット、だから参加したという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikchel says her target is Reset, so she joined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふてぶてしい女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brazen woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: → Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェルに乱義の呪いを解かせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have Rikchel lift Rangi's curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットが辻呪い犯として逮捕する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset is arrested as a random curse offender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場、朝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tavern, morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール、リセット、他数名・・　朝きっちりしている子達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, Reset, and a few others... kids who are punctual in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール君、明日は決勝だよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell-kun, the final is tomorrow, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまできたから、がんばろう。アレキサンダーさんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we've come this far, let's do our best. Alexander, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにアレキサンダーが現れて少し会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander appears there and has a brief conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと乱義が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu and Rangi appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい聞いたか、カオスの広場がオープンしたぞ、いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, did you hear? The Chaos Plaza has opened, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れたのか、俺達の目的は闘神大会に優勝する事ではない、負けたのはくやしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you forgotten? Our goal isn't to win the Fighting God tournament. Losing doesn't frustrate me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事なのは、本戦に出場してカオスの広場に入り、木のオーブを取る事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's important is to enter the main battle, get into Chaos Plaza, and take the wooden orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔剣カオスを引き抜く事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then to pull out the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが、別に急がなくても決勝が終わってからでもいいんじゃないと言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said there's no need to rush and we can wait until after the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして誰かに先に抜かれてはいけないだろ、急ごうとひっぱられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But maybe no one should pull it out before us, so they urge to hurry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの広場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Plaza

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに入れるのは、本戦に出場した　エール、ザンス、乱義、レリコフ、アームズ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can enter here are main battle participants: Yell, Zansu, Rangi, Rerikof, Arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにアームズは先に来ていた。他に何名かの出場者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms had already come earlier, along with several other participants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんが魔剣カオスの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san explains about the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台座を調べると木のオーブが見つかった。やったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Investigating the pedestal, we found the wooden orb. Yay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで全部揃ったぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now we have everything complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、乱義、アームズ、レリコフがチャレンジ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, Rangi, Arms, and Rerikof try the challenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者もチャレンジするが駄目・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others also try, but no good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの負の力で持つとみんな力が抜ける感じになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Chaos's negative power, anyone who holds it feels all their strength drained.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス・・俺はランスを倒せる可愛い女の子にしか抜けないぞ。次のオーナーは美女だ。美女。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says... I can only be pulled out by a cute girl who can defeat Rance. The next owner will be a beauty. A beauty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはしゃべる剣である所を見せつけ、まわりを煽る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos shows that it is a talking sword and stirs up those around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスは別にいいかとスルーしようとするエール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell tries to ignore Chaos thinking it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが誰かに勧められてやるだけやってみる事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But persuaded by someone, he decides to at least try.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを引き抜こうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Attempts to pull out the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが男なら、男は嫌だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yell were a man, I don't want a man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが女なら、まだ若すぎる。もっとぼいなぼいんになってからだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yell is a woman, still too young. Should wait until more... well-endowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、抵抗むなしく抜かれてしまう。あーれ、なして・・抵抗出来なーーーいとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, despite resistance, it's pulled out. "Ah, why... I can't resist!" says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿屋に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returned to the inn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶーたれるザンス、アームズ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pouting Zansu and Arms.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Losing doesn't frustrate me."},{"lineNumber":259227,"originalJapaneseLine":"大事なのは、本戦に出場してカオスの広場に入り、木のオーブを取る事だ","translatedEnglishLine":"What's important is to enter the main battle, get into Chaos Plaza, and take the wooden orb."},{"lineNumber":259228,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして魔剣カオスを引き抜く事。","translatedEnglishLine":"And then to pull out the magic sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259229,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが、別に急がなくても決勝が終わってからでもいいんじゃないと言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone said there's no need to rush and we can wait until after the finals."},{"lineNumber":259230,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして誰かに先に抜かれてはいけないだろ、急ごうとひっぱられる","translatedEnglishLine":"But maybe no one should pull it out before us, so they urge to hurry."},{"lineNumber":259231,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスの広場","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos Plaza"},{"lineNumber":259232,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここに入れるのは、本戦に出場した　エール、ザンス、乱義、レリコフ、アームズ","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who can enter here are main battle participants: Yell, Zansu, Rangi, Rerikof, Arms."},{"lineNumber":259233,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでにアームズは先に来ていた。他に何名かの出場者も","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms had already come earlier, along with several other participants."},{"lineNumber":259234,"originalJapaneseLine":"シュリさんが魔剣カオスの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Shuri-san explains about the magic sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":259236,"originalJapaneseLine":"台座を調べると木のオーブが見つかった。やったー","translatedEnglishLine":"Investigating the pedestal, we found the wooden orb. I can't resist!\" says Chaos."},{"lineNumber":259250,"originalJapaneseLine":"宿屋に戻った","translatedEnglishLine":"Returned to the inn."},{"lineNumber":259251,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶーたれるザンス、アームズ","translatedEnglishLine":"Pouting Zansu and Arms."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も・・あいつの子を産んでいたら、エールみたいな子が居たのかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I had also borne his child, maybe there would have been a child like Yell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやいや、ないない、そんな事考えるなんて私らしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, no way, thinking like that isn't like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いい、あの子らは　とんでもない才能を受け継いでいるがまだまだ甘い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, whatever. Those kids have inherited incredible talent but are still naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が指導してやるさ。あの子らなら私が届かなかった高みまでいけるかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll give them guidance. They might be able to reach heights I couldn't.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tavern

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなで集まって食事という所だがメンバーが少ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a place where everyone gathers to eat, but there are few members.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し暗い雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A slightly gloomy atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽勝だと意気込んで戦いに向かったザンスがアレキサンダーに敗れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, who enthusiastically went into battle expecting an easy win, was defeated by Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義も魔女クリチェルに負けた、さらに呪いを掛けられて目が見えなくなっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi also lost to the witch Krichel and was further cursed, losing his sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも落ち込んで部屋から出てこない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both are down and won't come out of their rooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ、まったくメンタル弱いな、私は負けたのに平気だそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, your mentality is really weak. I lost but I'm fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日、エールに負けたのもちょっとミスっただけだ、次やればまだまだ私の方が強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing to Yell today was just a small mistake. Next time I'm still much stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチルについて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Rikuchil

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義は、今も目が見えないまま、治療の方法が分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi still cannot see, and the method to cure him is unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット　昔から居るカラーの裏切り者、パステルなら解除出来るが私には無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, a traitor among the colors who has been around for a long time. Pastel can undo it, but I can't.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール、次、僕が対戦だから必ず倒して、その呪いを解かせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, next it's my turn to fight, so I'll definitely defeat and have that curse lifted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準決勝第２試合
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Semi-final, match 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Colosseum

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アナウンスでエールとリクチェルが紹介される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Announcement introduces Yell and Rikchel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェル　ターゲットはリセット、だから参加したという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rikchel says her target is Reset, so she joined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふてぶてしい女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brazen woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: → Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リクチェルに乱義の呪いを解かせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have Rikchel lift Rangi's curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットが辻呪い犯として逮捕する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset is arrested as a random curse offender.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒場、朝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tavern, morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール、リセット、他数名・・　朝きっちりしている子達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell, Reset, and a few others... kids who are punctual in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール君、明日は決勝だよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell-kun, the final is tomorrow, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまできたから、がんばろう。アレキサンダーさんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since we've come this far, let's do our best. Alexander, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにアレキサンダーが現れて少し会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander appears there and has a brief conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと乱義が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu and Rangi appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい聞いたか、カオスの広場がオープンしたぞ、いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, did you hear? The Chaos Plaza has opened, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れたのか、俺達の目的は闘神大会に優勝する事ではない、負けたのはくやしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you forgotten? Our goal isn't to win the Fighting God tournament. Losing doesn't frustrate me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事なのは、本戦に出場してカオスの広場に入り、木のオーブを取る事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's important is to enter the main battle, get into Chaos Plaza, and take the wooden orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔剣カオスを引き抜く事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then to pull out the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが、別に急がなくても決勝が終わってからでもいいんじゃないと言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said there's no need to rush and we can wait until after the finals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして誰かに先に抜かれてはいけないだろ、急ごうとひっぱられる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But maybe no one should pull it out before us, so they urge to hurry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの広場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos Plaza

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに入れるのは、本戦に出場した　エール、ザンス、乱義、レリコフ、アームズ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can enter here are main battle participants: Yell, Zansu, Rangi, Rerikof, Arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにアームズは先に来ていた。他に何名かの出場者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms had already come earlier, along with several other participants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんが魔剣カオスの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san explains about the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台座を調べると木のオーブが見つかった。やったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Investigating the pedestal, we found the wooden orb. Yay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで全部揃ったぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now we have everything complete.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、乱義、アームズ、レリコフがチャレンジ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu, Rangi, Arms, and Rerikof try the challenge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者もチャレンジするが駄目・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others also try, but no good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスの負の力で持つとみんな力が抜ける感じになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Chaos's negative power, anyone who holds it feels all their strength drained.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス・・俺はランスを倒せる可愛い女の子にしか抜けないぞ。次のオーナーは美女だ。美女。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says... I can only be pulled out by a cute girl who can defeat Rance. The next owner will be a beauty. A beauty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはしゃべる剣である所を見せつけ、まわりを煽る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos shows that it is a talking sword and stirs up those around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスは別にいいかとスルーしようとするエール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell tries to ignore Chaos thinking it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが誰かに勧められてやるだけやってみる事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But persuaded by someone, he decides to at least try.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを引き抜こうとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Attempts to pull out the magic sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが男なら、男は嫌だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yell were a man, I don't want a man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールが女なら、まだ若すぎる。もっとぼいなぼいんになってからだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Yell is a woman, still too young. Should wait until more... well-endowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、抵抗むなしく抜かれてしまう。あーれ、なして・・抵抗出来なーーーいとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, despite resistance, it's pulled out. "Ah, why... I can't resist!" says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿屋に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returned to the inn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶーたれるザンス、アームズ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pouting Zansu and Arms.
